name: Pure-guitar-tuner
tagline: Simple, elegant, useful - A guitar tuner for iOS
body:
Pure Guitar Tuner ================= The idea was to create a simple yet beautiful (free) guitar tuner for iOS that works amazingly. As a guitar player, I am disappointed by the free guitar tuners on the App Store, so here is the proposed remedy. Pure Guitar Tuner [Google Group](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/pure-guitar-tuner) for interest. ### Screenshot

Current look as of 05/11/2014 ## Contributing Feel free to fork the repo and open a pull request. Using fairly normal convention, make changes in a separte branch then request to pull into `master`. I lack the sound detection skills on iOS to get the frequency detection working well, but I'm sure we can make it work together. ## License Pure Guitar Tuner is licensed under the [MIT license.](https://github.com/tfrank64/Pure-Guitar-Tuner/blob/master/LICENSE.md)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
